lead_paragraph: Small, inconspicuous acts of rebellion have taken aim at perhaps the candidate’s most prized possession — his brand name — by boycotting what he’s selling.
snippet: Small, inconspicuous acts of rebellion have taken aim at perhaps the candidate’s most prized possession — his brand name — by boycotting what he’s selling....
abstract: Many voters across country who are alarmed by presidential campaign of Donald J Trump have engaged in minor acts of protest, including canceling reservations at Trump's golf clubs and hotels, or declining to buy products that feature his brand name; many are motivated not just by incendiary comments Trump has made on campaign trail, but also by idea that Trump's wealth was made by exploiting people just like them.

headline.main: The New Protesters Defying Donald Trump: His Customers
headline.print_headline: Protest of Trump Hits Sensitive Spot: His Brand
